DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical investigation gather data evaluate impact use Eeva traditional morphology grade implantation rate .
DOC.brief_title: US Eeva™ Pregnancy Investigational Clinical Study ( US EPIC )
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose clinical investigation gather data evaluate impact implantation rate Day 3 embryo transfer use Eeva morphology grading ( test group ) versus Day 3 embryo transfer use morphology grading ( concurrent control group ) .
DOC.criteria: Women undergo fresh vitro fertilization treatment use egg donor egg . IVF cycle attempt ≤ 2 . Egg age ≤ 40 year . Planned Day 3 embryo transfer . At least 4 normally fertilize egg ( 2PN ) . All 2PN embryo must image Eeva . Ejaculated sperm sperm epididymis ( fresh frozen ) . Willing comply study protocol procedure . Willing provide write informed consent . Planned preimplantation genetic diagnosis preimplantation genetic screening . Planned `` freeze '' cycle ( oocytes embryos ) . Sperm retrieve testicular tissue . Abnormal uterine cavity evaluate standard method . Gestational carrier . Endometriosis Hydrosalpinx . History cancer . Concurrent participation another clinical study .
